text: Paul Varelans (September 17, 1969 â€“ January 16, 2021) was an American mixed martial artist. He competed in Ultimate Fighting Championship from 1995 to 1996. He had a fixed match in Extreme Championship Wrestling in 1996. He was born in Sunnyvale, California. In December 2020, Varelans was hospitalized with COVID-19 in Atlanta, Georgia and was put into an induced coma. He died on January 16, 2021 from the infection at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from California Category:People from Santa Clara County, California Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Atlanta
title: Paul Varelans
